snippet: The banks that bought up failing rivals are now being sued for the misdeeds of those firms before their rescues. Next time, Wall Street may be less cooperative.
abstract: The banks that bought up failing rivals are now being sued for the misdeeds of those firms before their rescues. Next time, Wall Street may be less cooperative.

headline.main: Nowadays, Wall Street Saviors May Wish They Weren't
headline.print_headline: Nowadays, Wall St. Saviors May Wish They Weren’t
